ownerName.description: The owner of the GitHub repository.

repoName.description: The name of the GitHub repository.

releaseTypes.description: The list of release types. Example: preview or production.

githubTokenEnvVarName.description: The name of the environment variable that contains the GitHub token.

orgProjectName.description: The name of the GitHub organization project. This is a V2 project. (Optional)

versionFilePath.description: The relative path to the file that contains the version number. Both JSON and csproj files are supported. (Optional)

versionJSONKeyPath.description: The path to the version number in the JSON file. Only used if the file is a JSON file. (Optional)

releaseNotesFilePrefix.description: The path to the version number in the JSON file. Only used if the file is a JSON file. (Optional)

trimFromStartOfVersion.description: The list of strings to trim from the start of the version number. (Optional)
